document_name: Decree D/98/194/PRG/SGG (creating and organizing the FOMI Hydropower Development Project)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/GIN/1998/GIN-1998-09-18-Decree D_98_194_PRG_SGG (creating and organizing the FOMI Hydropower Development Project)_03a665e282bb171fc7de8dc647eb2d8b.pdf
document_description: This Decree greates and sets the functioning rules for the FOMI hydroelectric project. FOMI is in charge of realising studies, mobilising financing options and constructing the electric line associated to a dam project on the Niandan river in Baro.
